The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, Prepare ye <S%G2090><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>, make <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5720><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight <S%G2117><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> <S%G5765><s%> with camel's <S%G2574><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with a girdle <S%G2223><s%> of a skin <S%G1193><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he did eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5723><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%>;
